article_title: The Growing Threat of ISIS Unleashing a Weapon of Mass Destruction
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: Much less widely known are the use of chemical weapons by ISIS in Iraq and Syria or the disappearance of radioactive materials in Iraq that could be used in a “dirty bomb”
